trends: There have been 8 other sightings in Tallinn
There were no other sightings in Tallinn on or around
divs: Sighting DetailsI was walking with my friends when i noticed very bright flash in the sky (brighter than stars). We stopped and started looking for the source, but there was nothing. A few seconds later, another bright flash appeared, but already in different place - it moved to the North I think. We saw approximately 5-7 flashes and it took 2-3 minutes at all. The distance between them was about 15-20 seconds. I have read a report from Great Britain, dated the same day, and think that we saw same object.
